eligibility.right-to-work-intro: You do not need to use this service if the worker has any of the following:
eligibility.worker-has-ppt: a UK or Irish passport (or Irish passport card)
eligibility.worker-has-ho-docs: immigration documents from the Home Office that demonstrate a right to work
eligibility.worker-has-digital-right: a digital immigration status that demonstrates a right to work

ineligible.header: You do not need to request a Home Office right to work check
ineligible.ineligible-intro: You do not need to request a right to work check if the worker:
ineligible.ineligible-has-ppt: has a UK or Irish passport or Irish passport card (current of expired)
ineligible.ineligible-has-ho-docs: has immigration documents from the Home Office that show a right to work
ineligible.ineligible-has-digital-right: has an immigration status which you can check online that demonstrates a right to work
ineligible.ineligible-outro-link: need to check that the employee's or prospective employee's documents are valid
ineligible.ineligible-outro-2: and keep copies of the documents.

ineligible-employee.header: You do not need to request a Home Office right to work check
ineligible-employee.ineligible-employee-reason-1: If the employee has been working for you, without a break in employment, from a date before 29 February 2008, then you do not need to request a right to work check.
ineligible-employee.ineligible-employee-link: Document checks should have been carried out when the person was recruited.
ineligible-employee.ineligible-employee-reason-2: This would have established you with a statutory defence from prosecution which you retain throughout the individual's employment.
ineligible-employee.ineligible-employee-reason-3: Therefore no further checks are required provided that the employment has been continuous.

ineligible-tupe.header: You do not need to request a Home Office right to work check
ineligible-tupe.ineligible-tupe-employee-reason-1: If the employee has been working for you as a result of TUPE transfer, without a break in employment, from a date before 29 February 2008, then you do not need to request a right to work check.
ineligible-tupe.ineligible-tupe-employee-link: Document checks should have been carried out when the person was recruited.

ineligible-document.header: You must have seen the original document
ineligible-document.p1: You must have seen the original application registration card to request a right to work check.
ineligible-document.p2: The purpose of this tool is to check the validity of documents you have seen.
